info.description: This is API-docs of backend server of Harmonica team.
info.title: Harmonium backend API

get.description: Get boards created by user by user nickname.

post.description: Delete pin from board by pin id and board id.

get.description: Get users that liked pin by pin ID
get.summary: Get last 20 users that liked pin

get.description: Logout user by their session cookie
Get pins of user by page
get.summary: Get pins that created by user id

get.description: Get pin by id in the slug

delete.description: Delete pin by id (allowed only for pin's author)

post.description: Sets like by pin id and auth token

delete.description: Delete like by pin id and auth token

post.description: Register user by POST request and add them to DB

get.description: Update user by description and user id.

post.description: Update user by description and user id.

entity.FeedPinResponse.description: PinResponse information with author, pin id and content URL.

entity.PinAuthor.description: User-author information with user id, nickname and avatar

entity.UserList.description: User information with user id, email, nickname and avatar_url

entity.UserResponse.description: User information with user id, email, nickname and avatar_url
